articles.description: Sony has already confirmed one PS Plus free game for April 2023, but there are some good options to round it out alongside PS Plus Extra and Premium
articles.content: Sony is expected to reveal the next batch of PS Plus free games on Wednesday, March 29, and it'll be interesting to see what comes in April. The PS Plus free games for March 2023 were good, but not g… [+3381 chars]
